website_summaries.verdict: This stroller is durable, sturdy, and comfortable for pets up to 70 pounds. It's suitable for cats or dogs and the all around mesh allows pets to see out from every side.
pros: The Pet Gear No-Zip NV Pet Stroller is a large three-wheeled stroller with pneumatic tires
It's sturdy, and the no-zip closure is easy to open and close
cons: The stroller is heavy and some users have said the back wheels wobble

customer_reviews.title: Excellent stroller for our Maltese
customer_reviews.text: Excellent stroller for our Maltese, air tires provide the smoothest ride, easy to assemble, couldn't beat the price. It also came with the pad and rain cover. No issues out of the box. After reading the few neg reviews here and on other web sites, decided to add some straps for added support/stability. They don't interfear with folding, makes the bottom of the compartment stable, will prevent seams ripping, bolts poking through.The Velcro fasteners underneath don't have to be used, easier folding and unfolding. 2.00 ea. for the straps @ wally world (camping area). She loves to ride in it, little big when folded, 28 lbs or so, but a quality stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: After only 10 weeks of light use it is broken
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pet stroller to move my 13 lb Dachshund around the first floor in my house during her recovering period after a back surgery. The stroller was used only 4 weeks between 11-2015 and 12-2015, then my dog had a second back surgery and the stroller has been used for 6 weeks since 3-2016. Today is 04-28-2016, and the front wheel is broken. All those little parts fell down when I moved the stroller. Edited to add: my husband called customer service, and they are sending the parts that need to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Look no further!  Totally worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to use this stroller. I had purchased one a few years ago but it was a cheap one that in the end did not last long. The wheels were plastic and it wasn't a smooth ride. We took our first walk today and the ride was so smooth! Oliver was able to look out the front, back and both sides. The no zipper closure was very easy to use and very secure. I would recommend this stroller to anyone looking for a pet stroller. The price maybe higher than other strollers but you get what you pay for. This is a high end product. Very easy to put together as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nightwhisk

customer_reviews.title: We love the stroller
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for our 11 year old pug who is handicapped. She can no longer use her back legs to walk. We love the stroller. It is large, equipped with a cup holder, and rolls smoothly. The problem is that after about 2 weeks of use, the front wheel no longer worked. It turned side ways as you pushed the stroller forward. It turns out that the bearings in the front wheel swivel disintegrated. The bearing shields were made out of gold tin foil.See attached photo. We repaired this by replacing the broken pieces with higher quality parts.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: SEAM RIPPED AND MY DOG FELL OUT !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am shocked at how poorly this stroller is sewn together !!! I have an 11 lb yorkie.. I have had the stroller not even 2 weeks and the seam ripped on one side and my yorkie fell out of the stroller !!!! I am LIVID !!! I paid alot of money for this stroller and it literally fell apart in 2 weeks .. PLUS MY YORKIE GOT HURT !!!!! I will be calling amazon for a refund !!! I like the air ride tires , but its VERY HARD TO FOLD and very bulky ... Takes up alot of room in the trunk .... VERYYYYYYYYYYYYYY DISAPPOINTED IN THIS STROLLER !!!! :(((((((((
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: So I don't recommend buying it
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be an ok product! however, the pin on the wheels, which is supposed to keep the wheel in place, does not work! I walked my puppy little, in 2 minute R wheel came off, I pushed it inside, tried to lock it! (pin, out) continued to walk the puppy! and again in another 2 minute, the L wheel came off!!!!! So I don't recommend buying it! It's sad after 2 weeks no one from seller contacted me! I wish I could cut further down on stars!
customer_reviews.author: mahrokh

customer_reviews.title: Well made dog stroller with a design flaw due to placement of air valves on tires.
customer_reviews.text: A well-made stroller for dogs. It's snap shut netted hood is nice to prevent the dog from jumping out. The reason I'm giving her such a low rating is due to the position of the bowels of the tires. There is a design flaw go with the small air pump and how you attach it to the tires to pump them up. In order to pump it up you have to get between spokes and from the inside under the buggy new regular bike. No regular bike pump will fit this due to this design flaw. Had I known this I probably would've gotten something else that was easier to blow the tires up.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Tires flat after a few uses.
customer_reviews.text: Have used this thing MAYBE ten times in the past year. I have a pug who cant walk, on a beautiful day like today - went to use it... tires were flat. Went to fill the tires, and they wont fill. Tried to contact seller to assistance - no help anywhere, cant replace, cant return. Really annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Shelby Templeton

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy - front axle is weak and prone to twisting which makes it unuseable
customer_reviews.text: We literally got 3 dog walks out of this before the front wheel axel twisted and made using this a nightmare since the front wheel is twisted off to the side. Or elderly dog is only 15 pounds. Otherwise a nice product, but completely let down by this weak point. To think we paid over $200 for this, still causes "pain"!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this stroller. The entire bottom and sides of stroller canvas fell apart with normal use. We bought this for our dog that has a spinal cord disorder. He can not walk far distances. We had this less than a year and it basically disintegrated at the seams. Very poor quality and for the price expected to use it a lot longer. Customer service at Pet Gear was contacted and received no help. I do NOT advise buying this product!
customer_reviews.author: Dotti

customer_reviews.title: Check carefully for sewing!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the large tires and relatively easy maneuverability. But! I have had it only eight months. I am 74 years old. The stroller is used for a 13 lb., 13 year old Yorkie. I push it on sidewalks about six blocks, once, sometimes twice daily. I was a happy camper. Until a few days ago. I discovered that a seam has come unsewn where the fabric is attached to the metal frame in front of the basket under the dog bed. I have been a seamstress all my life. The problem is that NO WAY can I resew the seam. Not enough fabric. I am some disappointed. I expected better quality.
customer_reviews.author: RLC

customer_reviews.title: Tire will not stay on... They sent me a tire!!
customer_reviews.text: It seems I received one with a defective back tire. The tire won't stay in the blasted stroller. I got this stroller for my dog has just gone through congestive heart failure. Her and I are used to being active, and we were looking forward to being able to go on walks and runs again. If I could get a new tire which will stay in, if be happy. Hate returning things. Update--- I contacted Pet Gear via email and let them know a rear wheel would not stay on. They sent me one right away. I was able to use the stroller tonight and am so pleased. Stroller is very responsive. Josephene was very comfortable. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Front wheel, bearings, mount broke
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this two years with limited use. My dog is only 15lb. We use the stroller while I walk around the neighborhood. Today the front wheel started to wiggle and the front mount broke. Ball bearings poured out. My husband took a look at it and there is no way to repair it. I’m really frustrated I paid $250 for this stroller and only got a handful of walks with it. Because you can’t repair it, I have to throw it away. I’m really upset.
customer_reviews.author: B. Herrin

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: We have four Ragdoll cats and they have now trained us. They love this stroller and don’t want me to put it away. I can find one of them sleeping in it daily. Each morning one will jump in ready for a walk. Upon my return, the next baby jumps in her his/her turn. At this rate I should be able to drop weight pretty fast. ;) Can’t even go to the door without of of them wanting to go for a walk. Only thing is that it’s doesn’t turn really sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Wheel falls off, doesn't collapse and doesn't turn
customer_reviews.text: I bought this very expensive pet stroller to transport my dogs on the ferry between Nantucket and Hyannis. I bought it in late June and used it once that month. I used it for the second time today. It has been sitting in my house untouched between those times. Today, one of the back wheels kept falling off, the stroller won't collapse, and it resists turning. I am extremely disappointed in this purchase and will be attempting to obtain a refund for an obviously defective product.
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller
customer_reviews.text: I fit 2 Chihuahua puppies (3.5lbs each), 1 Chin Chihuahua (7.4lb) and 1 Chihuahua/terrier (16lbs) in the stroller at one time with a little room to spare. Rolls very easy, rolling over bumps are no problem. The no-zipper feature is great, with 4 in there I need to be able to close it up fast. We have taken the dogs to the pet store for nail clippings and were able to walk around the mall getting them exposure to different situations without the risk of someone stepping on them.
customer_reviews.author: Baysir

customer_reviews.title: back wheel wobbles.  There's no way to contact vender for replacement wheel!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Overall I love this stroller, but there's a gap when top is closed big enough for a kitten to escape. Also, one of the back wheels wobbles. Why is there no way to contact the vendor about a replacement back wheel??????? UPDATE: Replacement received missing the tire pump. Bad review will remain until I receive the pump I paid for. There is NO WAY to contact the vender that I have been able to find, so if the vender reads this, send me the pump and I'll upgrade the review. I really like this stroller, but it's the second one and with a missing part that I paid for. I am NOT pleased with this company so far.
customer_reviews.author: fiberartist

customer_reviews.title: Just looked nice on the photo but was un-usuable  and total waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Back wheels are supposed to "easy click into the place". Yes, that they do and then fell off within minutes of walking... In addition bulky and heavy with a very small area for a dog ( barely enough for my cocker spaniel) . Just looks nice on the photo...Don't buy it... I did buy the used one so there is a possibility that previous owner sold ma a"lemon"...
customer_reviews.author: Zofia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Stroller for Active People
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for a stroller for your pet, this is the best! We generally use it for about 3 miles a day, a mixture of walking and jogging, and it’s still going awesome after three months! I bought it for my senior Papillon, but it’s also great when she has foster siblings who don’t want to (or can’t) walk much either. The one thing to know: You have to lock the front wheel unless you’re literally just puttering around. You control the stroller by leaning it, with the front wheel locked, unless you’re taking it in a shop or somewhere narrow where you need to move slowly and with great precision (then unlock the front wheel).
customer_reviews.author: Sonja BegoniaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Seat tears easily.
customer_reviews.text: We have had our stroller for about 60 days and have used it 10-12 times. We have two 10 lb Dachshunds that both sit in the stroller. Unfortunately, I noticed a large rip in the base of the seat today. I had not noticed it before because of the padded insert. I have now missed the return window. Disappointed. I did also find that this difficulty to fold up/collapse. Maneuvers well and wheels seem high quality. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: AMC

customer_reviews.title: This stroller is Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller was such a good purchase! As you can see, we have two little yorkies and they are both young and in great health, but our issue is that when we go out with them, they get a little yappie so we wanted a way to contain them, without having to carry them when they act out. We received it last night and have tried it out. Our pups seem to like it so far, so we are excited to take it out this weekend. It is made of high quality material and seems very durable. It was a snap to put together.. maybe took us less than 10 minutes:) Great purchase overall!
customer_reviews.author: Ericka

customer_reviews.title: Approved by Chihuahua's
customer_reviews.text: My 2 Chihuahua's love this stroller! They actually don't mind being locked in. We like to go on long walks and they can't go very far. Works great on city and country roads, grass, & stones. It can handle the bigger stones but would rather push them in the grass. Easy to push even with one hand. Stores everything we need underneath. Cup holders are not deep enough to hold a bottle (they just fall off with every bump) so we just put them underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Had returned another -  - that had nowhere for the dogs to put their paws and stay safely inside. In fact, they could just walk right out of that one, if they weren't completely zipped up behind. My dogs like to look out. This NV keeps them inside even when top is up and needs no zipper (pain in rump) to close the dogs inside stroller. I like the fact that I can take them anywhere now. The strollers with cheap double wheels cannot do dirt (ie at fairs, farmer's markets). This baby is expensive. You get what you pay for. It even comes with an air pump which I have yet to use.
customer_reviews.author: Diamond Girl

customer_reviews.title: Folds up and assembles great, holds up like trash
customer_reviews.text: We've used this stroller about 10 times over the course of 2 years for our 45 pound bulldog. The tires deflate super fast. The pump doesn't engage the valve in the tires so re-inflating them without DIY nonsense every time is impossible. The bottom board is broken. The fabric across the bottom is tearing badly. 1 star because it held up fine the first 3 or 4 times we used it (before it fell apart like garbage).
customer_reviews.author: SirTommyTom

customer_reviews.title: Changed our lives
customer_reviews.text: We have a 9 year old dog around 50lb, suffering from severe mobility issues. He stopped walking entirely last year around the time we purchased this stroller, and is not even able to sit up on his own. It has been a life saver. We've been able to go on vacation twice, out to restaurants and shopping. Because of his condition it is not safe to leave him unattended at any time and he is too heavy to carry. The fit is a little tight for him but overall it is fine. He loves it because he is high enought to be able to look around. Easy to open, close and load in the back of our sedan.
customer_reviews.author: R. Sharara

customer_reviews.title: This is a great  stroller but bearing problem had to be replaced
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE on April 17, 2016: the bearing in the housing holding the front wheel has shattered. No idea why. Will be calling Per Gear tomorrow to see if they will replace it. UPDATE on June 6, 2016 the company did replace the bearing and also the front wheel, which was damaged when the bearing broke. The bad thing is that there is a part in the bearing mechanism that is NOT sized right. My hubby did go get a washer at hardware store in a different size to ensure that this does not happen again. They need to take care of this issue and get the right parts.
customer_reviews.author: Debra H

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I'm impressed. My dogs seem to know they need to behave in this as we've gone incognito into Starbucks and restaurants. A lot of places that would normally not allow dogs are ok with them going in as long as they stay in the buggy and don't bark. It's amazing how my two know to keep quiet inside places. Outside is another story, especially if they see other dogs or animals. So far they haven't blown their cover yet!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Pahwa

customer_reviews.title: Cats paradise
customer_reviews.text: This is so very well made. Very high quality. Easy to assemble. It took me about 10 minutes by myself. The no ability of it is fantastic. It goes on grass like a smooth floor. The height is great too, I have a bad back and leaning down hurts but this is perfect. The drink tray goes about 3 inches above my belly button so that it is close to the same height as a grocery shopping cart for handle placement which is great for my back. My cat loves it. He is a solid 16 pound cat and he actually lays in it even when we are home. It’s also my cats crib. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Tina Meador

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this stroller
customer_reviews.text: PROS: So easy to push and maneuver! I like the stroller’s storage basket underneath and zipperless entry. CONS: Short warranty - 30 days - wonder why it is so short??? All three wheels have very slight wobble. Hope it isn't an indication of things to come. Cupholder too small for my Yeti (thermos). Oh well. My 12 pound dog fits in the stroller perfectly. Tight fit if I add my other 12 pound dog. I love that I can easily push the stroller and walk my other dog on a leash quite easily. We put straps underneath the compartment like another reviewer suggested to make it more sturdy holding our pooch, but my husband doesn’t think it was really necessary.
customer_reviews.author: CraigW

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t ask for a better pet stroller!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this pet stroller because we will take our kitten with us this summer in our RV for a two month, two country excursion. It exceeds our expectations! It’s easy to assemble and fold-but more importantly, it offers a smooth ride over all terrains. Our kitten loves it! He even jumps in it at home just to hang out. I love the fact there’s no zipper, which makes it easy to lock him in and let him out. I highly recommend this for cats-our guy is a Maine Coon, and he should weigh more than twenty pounds when he’s done growing.
customer_reviews.author: Martha & Jim

customer_reviews.title: Head's Up!
customer_reviews.text: 'Buyer's Beware' have had stroller six weeks...and have absolutely loved it! In the last two weeks I learned that two of the tire tubes are defective, and when taking a the last tire off noticed the base (stroller that the pet sits in) is ripping at a seam. Keep tabs on little things like this! We use it probably five days a week for an hour walk, so, so far we've clocked maybe 26 hours of walking in a bike lane on Coast Hwy. Not rugged terrain at all.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: My Pembroke Welsh Corgi and I are delighted with the Pet Gear No-zip Pet Stroller! ! was able to assemble it quickly and easily almost with out reading instructions; assembly was so intuitive The next day after receiving it we had rain all day. It was wonderful traveling across campus, navigating elevators and steering it in sidewalks, through doors, elevators halls, and in tight spaces. It is all I had hoped for and more.
customer_reviews.author: W Moore

customer_reviews.title: Front wheel spokes fell apart. DAY ONE....in my garage
customer_reviews.text: I want and hope I can edit this....Like all the other reviews the front wheel is an issue. I put this stroller together...its very simple....Listen for the "click" when attaching the wheel.... I take it outside and roll it 10 feet....Look at the pic. All the spokes came off and the stroller collapsed.
customer_reviews.author: Kara P

customer_reviews.title: Best dog stroller we've ever had!
customer_reviews.text: This is our third doggy stroller, and it's our favorite by far. It is roomy for our elderly 30 pound terrier mix pup, and easily traverses any surface. I clearly remember taking our old stroller on a hike and having to carry it half the time because its little wheels just couldn't handle the rough terrain. This one can take anything you throw at it (or at least has so far). Best of all, it's very simple to get our dog into and out of. The no zipper thing is a stroke of total brilliance!
customer_reviews.author: Allison S

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: This was my second attempt to find a good stroller for my senior dog. This stroller is perfect for my needs. It's definitely a smooth ride with air tires. It's also easy to fold (once you do it the first time). Its also a little slimmer than some others, which is great for me. The cup holder isn't deep so I'm not sure I'll use it but I can throw a bottle water in the underneath basket. Overall I'd highly recommend because you're pet will have a smooth ride! I purchase the divider too but not sure I'll keep it. It sits too high and unless the canopy is latched my dog could easily fall if she moved.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Not Air-Ride tires with valve stems, as pictured
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this because we wanted the "air tires"/"air ride" tires as noted in both the listing and in all of the photos. The photos show valve stems on the tires, as do the photos on the box the stroller came in. But, there are no valve stems, so no way to add air. Nowhere does it say the tires are gel tires, as some buyers have mentioned. We don't want gel tires :( We felt this was misleading. Change the photos and the description, please. We are still deciding whether or not to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Just

customer_reviews.title: Seriously take into consideration the limited 30 day warranty & beware of baggage loaders
customer_reviews.text: Used on side walk, street and stores for daily walks for 20 1b pet. Tried trail walk but back two wheels quickly flattened. Suggest carrying Fix-a-Flat for emergency use. I ended up having extra layer of inner tube protection installed by professional. Only owned for 8 months. Left wheel unstable. Took to bike shop and advised axel issue. Stroller still working but back left wheel wobbles. Center of carriage dips in middle; my solution was to put extra layer of cushion under provided cushion. Suggest having stroller looked over by bike shop professional if nearing the 30 day warranty. I did take my stroller on a flight; it's possible it may have been man-handled therefore causing axel issue.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Marie Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Fur a Baby Stroller!
customer_reviews.text: It took awhile to get but it is amazing and fit my two older fur babies comfortably. One is 8 pounds and the other is 13 pounds and there is still plenty of room for their leashes and plenty of poopy bags. The best part is that The hubs and I learned the girls like riding with the top down. 😉 We keep The lid open and when we approach strangers or other dogs boom, the top goes down and we can chose to latch or not to latch. Great quality and beautiful accent color. A lot of dog attacks happen in our area and I feel better that the stroller offers a first line of protection.
customer_reviews.author: Toni O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Awesomely cute, durable!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this item! It is very sturdy and beautiful! I bought it for my 5 lb. Yorkie she loves it. We took her out in it right after we unboxed it. She was just in love worth it and I felt very proud to have the Cadillac of pet strollers! I'm sure it will last a very long time. Well worth the money! I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: ReJane S VanDerBom

customer_reviews.title: Pet Gear Stroller is perfect
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is just what we needed for our aging Pomeranian who loves to go out for a walk but just doesn't have the stamina for long walks anymore. We let him walk for a while and ride for a while and he is very happy. The stroller folds up and easily fits into the trunk of my 2013 Honda Civic. The pneumatic tires are great on smooth paved walks, gravel walks or lawn. There is a basket underneath to carry additional items. We have put scores of miles on this stroller with no issues what so ever. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Hymie Glickmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller! My dog and I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this stroller and so does my Frenchie! He's about 30 lbs and can sit and lay down comfortably inside. Once he got used to being inside, he really enjoyed being able to spend more time with me while not aggravating his arthritis. Stroller is easy to assemble and very sturdy. I appreciate the inclusion of the tire pump and the rain cover. I bought this after reading many reviews and speaking with several small dog owners about the strollers they have. I'm removing one star only because I can't seem to figure out how to easy maneuver around curves.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren C

customer_reviews.title: Fabric quality won't hold up.
customer_reviews.text: Loved it at first, but seam started to fray where side and bottom meet. Huge hole in the side. Our dog is only 18 pounds so it isn't a weight thing. This is our third Pet Gear stroller so obviously we think they are one of the better ones out there. Very disappointed in how this held up. Bought one year ago today. We use about once a week. Like many features, but this is now unusable.
customer_reviews.author: DR Sarasota

customer_reviews.title: Happy Cat!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband got this for me and my cats. I have 4 lol, 3 hate it, the outgoing one loves it!! I take him on strolls all the time!! He doesn't look for a way out but I can't see how he could if he wanted to. He's about 14 1/2 lbs and fits in it great. He can sit of lie down and face forward or backwards as there is a mesh window from behind. We love this!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Thibodeaux

customer_reviews.title: 60 days in it has ripped.
customer_reviews.text: I have had my stroller for two months and the passenger part has ripped. My dog is 15 pounds and shouldn't be heavy enough to ruin it. Now the return window has closed. I saved up to get this and for the money I expected better. I'm very upset.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Heavy (30 lbs) but sturdy. Fits easily into the trunk of my Sonata. Collapses quite compactly despite how big it is. Only need 1 hand to collapse it once you get the hang of it. And there’s a plastic latch to keep it closed; not sure if this will hold up (might need to zip tie when flying). I fly a lot & so far the airlines have managed to keep it intact when it is gate checked. Only 1 tether but attachment is there for the 2nd dog; I developed my own makeshift tether because I cannot find one that works well.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin H

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Got this when my doggy was diagnosed with cancer.. we figured it’d be easier to take her with us when we go anywhere to keep an eye for her.. she is 20lbs , my shihtzu is 17.. as you see they both fit sitting.. my shihtzu has used it more as he is the big baby. He fits perfect and has enough room to stretch when he’s asleep.. definitely recommend it as it is also sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Sandra R

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous Customer Service! Service Representative "Julie" immediately responded to my request for service assistance and promptly sent a replacement part to resolve my issue. Excellent Warranty coverage and exceptional customer service support. Our NV stroller gets abundant daily use and after six months has proven to be an exceptional product and well worth purchasing. Heavy duty durable construction. Very easy to push with plenty of room. Use on any terrain. Very pleased with this stroller; worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: S. Peters

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller for jogging or walking fast
customer_reviews.text: The stroller was well-made and sturdy. Unfortunately did not work for my dogs and I had to return it. I did test it. It was comfortable for them. I also took a little jog and if you’re not running full speed ahead this is a great stroller for walking fast or jogging. I wish this would’ve worked for my dogs. The company had no problems returning it or giving me the money back. no questions asked.
customer_reviews.author: Indigochild77

customer_reviews.title: Love It & So Does Mr. Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Mr. Fabulous has a little trouble getting around. His rear legs don't work like they used to so taking him for a walk requires special equipment. I fabricated a little cart for him but it was a bit of a bumpy ride. I decided to purchase this pet stroller and I cannot be more pleased with it. It is easy to assemble & he appears very comfortable in It. Additionally the ride is smooth and maneuverable so his teeth don't rattle (if he had any) . I am very happy with this pet stroller and so is Mr. Fabulous
customer_reviews.author: KennyV

customer_reviews.title: Love the stroller even though mine did come with a manufacturing defect, that I was able to fix.
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller and my elderly pug does too. It is exactly as advertised. My only complaint being that when I went to assemble the stroller, one of the buttons on the wheel assembly was jammed up inside the tube. I had to get some forceps to reach in and grab it to pull it back down into the hole. It took some adjustment to get it to fit right. Once I finally got it into place and the spring tension just right the wheels finally went on without too much trouble. Apparently Quality Control missed this.
customer_reviews.author: Pennie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Very Important!  This Bolster in no way shape of form fits the stroller that is advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I bought both the stroller and the bolster and there is no way in heaven that this bolster was ever intended to work with the stroller that is advertised. It does not fit the stroller in any way, shape or form. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kitcat

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and well made, BUT
customer_reviews.text: I do like this stroller and my 30 lb dog fits, just fits, in it fine. There is no way a 70 lb dog would fit in this stroller. I would suggest anyone looking at any of this forget the weight and look at the width and length. My Whippet is recovering from TPLO surgery and I can get her out easily in this stroller. Easy to push and easy to collapse and put in the car. My only other complaint is the strap to hold the dog in is very thin and light. Even my 30 lb dog could break it and jump out, so I rigged up something heavier.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Front wheel broke within the 1st week of use for something this pricey its built poorly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tire issue but got replacement
customer_reviews.text: Bought it in April 2016. Left rear tire bulging and won't hold air. We literally roll the stroller down the hallway to the elevator to outside then on a paved street to grassy area and back.. Less than 100 yards each way and there's no reason for the tire the bulge and not hold air--update-- contacted Pet Gear and they had a replacement wheel in the mail the next day
customer_reviews.author: J. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Super Helpful for a dog with a broken leg.
customer_reviews.text: bought this when our westie broke her leg. the first one we had to send back after just a week because the webbing in the back of the stroller (provided to vent it) ripped out completely. second stroller held up better. It's pretty heavy to haul around in the car but it worked well.she went with us on walks the whole time she was in her cast (including lots of trail walking, or walking in grass). protected it well. Not sure how big a dog you should put it in though. We were able to put our male westie (about 22 lbs) in it, but not sure i'd go any bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Kristilee

customer_reviews.title: The button popped off!
customer_reviews.text: We had to return this stroller for a replacement. The first time using it, the button popped off on the front that is used to release the hood/cover. Our replacement arrived the next day! (Gotta love Amazon Prime!) This stroller is a bit heavy, but the maneuverability is amazing! It rolls over a lot of things that smaller wheels would definitely get hung up on. I hope the button stays on this one. I really like the stroller. Time will tell...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Doggie Stroller!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller arrives almost fully assembled. The minimal assembly you need to complete is very easy. It is well constructed but not too heavy, it's actually very easy to lift and move around. My dogs love it too! I have two Jack Russell Terriers (12 and 15 pounds). They fit in the stroller easily - both sitting and laying down. One of my dogs isn't able to walk as far as she used to, so we purchased this for her. I can easily walk one dog on the leash while pushing this stroller with one hand.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie M

customer_reviews.title: Suitable for urban and sidewalked areas only
customer_reviews.text: Front bearing broke after less than 10 days. But their customer service was very responsive and sent new parts quickly. Difficult stearing, especially if 1 handed only.Suitable for urban areas and sidewalks only, not good at all " off road" even if level terrain. Dutch Doggie Ride , which we also have for off road if vastly superior in all regards, although more expensive. Yet it is easy to fold up and store in car, etc which is very handy.
customer_reviews.author: J. kingston

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: We love the stroller we have a Boston terrier that does not get along well around other dogs and by putting her in the stroller she feels more secure when taking her for a walk in the park where she doesn’t have to get close to other dogs and we are able to take her into Home Depot and Lowe’s etc. with no problems and she loves to ride in it there’s plenty of room she weighs 28 pounds and the stroller is a very smooth ride easy to fold up made very well
customer_reviews.author: Trudy Blake

customer_reviews.title: Heavy-duty but light-weight, definitely worth price.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing for little dogs. Tires, frame, and canopy are top-of-the-line, heavy duty but light like a high-quality bike. Good for a stroll around the block or a long run. It has actual tires, not wheels, so you don't get the goofy-wheel grocery cart effect. It comes with a little emergency air pump if you get a flat. It snaps together solidly, you don't need any tools to assemble. I got it cheaper on Amazon, but this actually IS worth the asked price--which is actually more than I paid for the chihuahua I got my girlfriend. Considering she comfortably gets two of them in there, though, it all works out in the end. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ry Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Oh my I can’t even! It’s gorgeous!! 💕
customer_reviews.text: My fur baby loves it and so do I. Talk about LUXURY!! This stroller is the Cadillac of dog strollers. We got the pink lining and it’s just SO gorgeous. It maneuvers great too with the big wheels. It stops people in their tracks when they see my adorable Maltese baby in it. I swear she poses in it like the princess she is. She even wants back into it in our house. 🤗💕🐾 Great quality. You get what you pay for. Happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Small town girl

customer_reviews.title: I can't use it the wheel falls off
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful stroller but when it arrived there was a clip missing to one of the wheels and now I can not make the wheel stay on. I need help!!!!!! How can I get a replacement clip to make the wheel stay on?
customer_reviews.author: Irma

customer_reviews.title: This is the Mercedes of dog strollers!!!
customer_reviews.text: This really is a must have if you are looking for a dog stroller. It was pretty easy to put together. Just get all of the pieces together as shown in the directions and you won't have a problem. My sister purchased one and we got one for our friend who has small dogs. She loves it, too. Very stable. The air tires make a smooth ride for our dogs. If you have more than one, I would suggest getting the newer one that has the DOUBLE AIR WHEELS in the front. It's wider and more stable if the dogs all move up to the front. Our dogs LOVE, LOVE, LOVE going for rides in this stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: This is a horrible design.  The front wheel has come loose.  The entire front wheel mechanism is no longer tight and the area it
customer_reviews.text: This is a horrible design. The front wheel has come loose. The entire front wheel mechanism is no longer tight and the area it is held in is broken. The front wheel therefore flops to one side and cannot be pushed. You can crank it tight and it will work for an hour but it is a battle to push. There is no way to fix it as that part that the front wheel is in is plastic. Do not buy this stroller.
customer_reviews.author: catherine K.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, very large
customer_reviews.text: I want to give this 5 stars. It is wonderful for my dogs, 4 lb Chihuahua and 15 lb Norwich Terrier. They are comfortable together and they love to ride. They like being up off the ground and have ample room to lie down. I love everything about this stroller except one thing and that is why it is getting 4 out of 5 stars. It is big when folded. I have a mid-size SUV and it takes up more than half of the rear cargo space. Would I buy it again? Yes, in a heartbeat. Those with small cars won't have much other space for cargo.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana Michura

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t want a pet stroller than would fall apart quickly so avoided the cheaper models. This one is quite expensive but is very high quality and looks fantastic. It was quick to put together and I’ve had zero issues with it. The bed easily fits my 2 6lb Maltese and could probably fit a 3rd. The only thing I don’t like it how close the handle is to the body. I find my feet hitting the bottom of the stroller while walking. It the handle suck out a few more inches it wouldn’t be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Tamora

customer_reviews.title: Great but front wheels started wobbling after 2 weeks of use
customer_reviews.text: I've had the stroller for a month now. I love how it looks and it feels sturdy. My problem is after 2 weeks of us, the front wheels started wobbling. I locked and unlocked the level and maneuvered right and left and for some reason, it would stop wobbling. Now, every time I walk a bit faster, the front wheel would wobble. It scares my dog too. I don't expect this considering the price we paid.
customer_reviews.author: Powers

customer_reviews.title: Wheel came off after using for about 60 days
customer_reviews.text: I bought this April 30 2020. Used it for about 60 days once a day for about a two mile walk and yesterday June 28 2020 the back left wheel came off. There is no way to get it back on. Amazon only has a 30 day return window for this product so be careful when purchasing such an item as it will not be fixed or exchanged. Am hoping to somehow get replacement parts since it’s been amazing to have up until this happened. My 16 pound shitzu-poodle loves to ride in her carriage 😢
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love this stroller!
customer_reviews.text: We love this stroller. I have a 5lb maltese, she can sit and look over the arm rest or stand and lean on it. When we meet a large dog which could lead to barking, I can snap the cover close quickly. Our neighborhood streets are rough, without air ride we could not use a stroller. My only dislike is the cup holder, its not deep enough or large enough. I am having trouble finding something that will fit securely in it and living in the deep south, it's hot - water is a must. I do love this stroller!
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: This is the second stroller I have ordered from them in 1 month. Easy to put together but the first time I took it out wheel was wreaked. Returned it got my 2nd one, went for a walk and flat tire on pavement both times and maybe 3 mile walk. Not happy with this product! Move on to the next choice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect, already had one, it got a tear in it due to little lever on side kept getting stuck, but I hand sewed it back and remove lever because it was not needed, and still liked it so much we bought another as a gift for another person and they loved it. Will buy another if we need it, but we have been using our original for over 7 years daily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller for my French Bulldog! Love running with it.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Cappiello

customer_reviews.title: WHEEL FELL OFF AT DAY 3
customer_reviews.text: What is this?????? Wheel fell off. Almost seriously hurt my baby. Wtf????? I contacted Petgear and was told I would receive a replacement wheel an no charge within 10 business days. I will update review once received. In the meantime, I cancelled my refund request.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It has worked out great! My husband likes it because he's over 6 feet and it's perfect for his height. I'm 5 foot two and it works great for me to and I love how you how it's move on with one hand. The only problem if anything is that our dog is only 5 pounds, and there's a lot of room in there so she doesn't know exactly where to sit. Really no problem because I can put my purse in there and hide it is were strolling along!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Rogge

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Had to purchase twice. Product has ripped twice now in the same location. We hardly ever use the product, maybe three times since it was replaced. Obviously now its outside of the return period. Our pup is 21 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: kevin cullen

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality fabric, damaged before used
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box there was a tear about 2 inches long in the seam of the stroller compartment where your dog would sit. I dishes even have a chance to see if my dog would tolerate being in there. I contacted customer service and am waiting to hear back. Will return and order a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Decadence! Inside!
customer_reviews.text: Adding this one for pure inside use so older pug who can’t walk anymore has a cozy, high up position for interacting with me. She loves it, so do I. Even great for spinning around and dancing with her! This is my second stroller from pet gear- other stroller is around 17 years old and still in use almost daily! Has helped 6 older pugs now and is the best gear I ever invested in!! Can easily hold both my senior pugs on walks. So can new one - great brand!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Thrilled with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My dog had a leg injury and I was killing my back carrying her around everywhere so I started shopping for dog strollers. I almost bought the cheaper version with the small wheels but when I found out recovery from surgery would be 8-12 weeks I went for the better model. I am sooo glad I did. We took her to a few art fairs (before the quarantine started) and I watched others with the model I didn't buy struggle while my pup stroller handled like a champ. It turns on a dime and very easy to handle. My only con would be that it is not compact to fold up but I'll take that.
customer_reviews.author: ChristineM

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 14 year old rat terrier. He is about 10 lbs, and he has plenty of room to comfortably turn around, lay down, and stretch out. It folds up nicely and is well constructed. Based on the size of the pet compartment, this stroller could probably accommodate a dog up to 20 ish pounds and still be able to turn around comfortably with the screen closed. A bigger dog may be able to ride in this stroller if they laid down, but I don’t know if larger dogs would be able to turn around comfortably, as the pet compartment is long but kind of narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Baumruck

customer_reviews.title: TRIED OTHERS, THIS ONE IS SO FAR THE BEST!!!
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from a cheaper model I found on line. This one is so much better, and sturdier. It takes the sidewalk and bumps like a champ. I can tell my dog notices the difference. Especially with the panoramic view. We are able to not just stroll around the neighborhood, but also by the river. It's fantastic! I definitely advise anyone that interested in getting a pet stroller, this one is it...!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon M

customer_reviews.title: wheel fell off
customer_reviews.text: Front wheel fell off after third use and cannot repair.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya M Mc

customer_reviews.title: The back left wheel keeps coming off!
customer_reviews.text: Update: was able to get a hold of customer service through their website. They are sending me a replacement tire. Hopefully this will remedy the problem. I’ve reached out to the company twice, but haven’t received a response. The left back wheel keeps falling off after short walks. I think it’s got a defective part. Love the stroller but Can’t really use it without constantly looking down to make sure the wheel doesn’t fall off. I hope they can remedy it.
customer_reviews.author: db

customer_reviews.title: This is a great pet stroller
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pet stroller. This is the 3rd stroller I have purchased, upgrading each time. This is the cream of the crop and my Arabella loves it! Plenty of room and the pad is super soft. The wheels go on easy and pins lock them into place. Comes with a rain cover too! Strolls smooth as silk and the wheel lock is a bar that runs across the entire back so it locks both wheels at once. I hope to stroll many, many miles with my fur baby. A little pricey but I wouldn't trade it for anything now!
customer_reviews.author: KarenS

customer_reviews.title: Wheel bearings on the front wheel are bad now. Bad design
customer_reviews.text: Bought stroller in October. Wheel bearings on the front wheel are bad now. Bad design. Tried to call customer service. Nobody answers. Looking at the instructions. I noticed they offer no warranty.
customer_reviews.author: ken Matthews

customer_reviews.title: This is a great pet stroller
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pet stroller. It was easy to put it together and it seems to be well made. I have one cat now who will be riding in it and plan to add another soon. I was a bit concerned if there would be room for two and wondered if I should buy the one that said it was a double wide version. I'm glad I went with this one as I don't think there will be any problem for two cats to fit. I had a cheaper stroller in the past that zipped which was a pain. This one has a "catch" instead that fastens the top. That is very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: B in Orlando

customer_reviews.title: Large, good tires, legit stroller
customer_reviews.text: The cats love this! It’s long enough for my big “kids” to stretch out in, and they sleep in it in the living room. :) were still working on getting them to enjoy the neighborhood strolls though. Giving it 5 stars because I like it so far, and have nothing to compare it to. I’m glad I went with this one for my big (about 15lbs each) cats. They don’t ride together though.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Tighten front wheel to fix death wobble!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is VERY nice and rides smooth. In the beginning, i was very concerned because the death wobbles started with the front wheel. I called Pet Gear and they sent out new front bearings right away, so I felt much better about my purchase. However, when I took the front wheel off to install the new bearings, i realized the nut securing the wheel wasn't even tight. I changed the bearings out anyway, but the original ones looked fine. So, if you are experiencing the death wobbles, just tighten the front wheel and I'm confident this will solve your problem. I haven't had a problem since!
customer_reviews.author: Barbera Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Replacement
customer_reviews.text: This is the replacement from pet gear (very fast) first one lasted a little over 3 months before seams ripped out. our 7 pound pomeranian loves to ride. Added straps another showed in his review. need one more on rear to completely support base. There is no way it can hold a 70 pound animal barely big enough for our small pom. The new one we recieved has pneumatic tires no air valves so they have addressed that issue. tray is worthless cup holders to small added arm strap for phone over center section so my wife can watch step and time progress. Can only hope this one lasts longer.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: 70 lbs?
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together. Snap the wheel holder in, push the wheels in and you're good to go. The Rose is more pink and I love the color. I also love that the tires are real air filled rubber tires and that the stroller comes with a handy on the go tire pump. It's very easy to push and navigate on gravel. It is advertised to hold a 70 lb dog. While it may possibly be strong enough to hold 70 lbs, there is no way a 70 lb dog will fit inside the basket. My Lab passed away last year and she was around 70 lbs. I cannot even imagine trying to fit her inside this.
customer_reviews.author: Raemey

customer_reviews.title: It arrived on time with a mangled box but the stroller was perfect. It has a very smooth ride and my ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this 4 times in the 2 weeks that I have owned it. We walk for 5 miles at a time and the stroller has met every expectation that I had. It arrived on time with a mangled box but the stroller was perfect. It has a very smooth ride and my dog seems to enjoy it. I bought the stroller for my 19lb senor dog but for fun I placed our 60 lb 1 year old mixed staffordshire puppy in it and she also loved it. My 60lb golden doodle hated it and jumped right out....wants nothing to do with it. It is a pleasure to recommend this stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Laura G

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Stroller
customer_reviews.text: One of our dogs has congestive heart failure, and cannot walk very far before her legs collapse. We did not want to leave her feeling sad at home whilst we walk our other dog - and this wonderful stroller has solved that problem. It was incredibly easy to assemble - almost no assembly involved. It rolls along so well on excellent tires. I cannot say enough good things about it - it makes a wonderful difference in a very sick little doggies' life. It is also very good looking.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: DoggyJogger love!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Only used this a couple times but really like it. It is very sturdy and the wheels are very high quality- it is the quality of an actual baby jogger and just feels durable. Will post another review to update my thoughts on it after more use in a month or two... but upon arrival and a couple 3-4 miles walks around our neighborhood - we love it! and she LOVED it even more!!! One happy to pooch to get in it after she walks her 15 -20 min...depends how many times we have to stop and sniff :)
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Kuhn

customer_reviews.title: It is a secure clasp but I would have liked to see two more
customer_reviews.text: I just find myself wishing there were two extra clips securing the hood. I cannot put a leash on my cat and I worry about the clasp ever opening. It is a secure clasp but I would have liked to see two more, one on each side. The stroller is great otherwise. Smooth ride and easy to take up the steps to my condo. My cat enjoys the fresh air and sights outdoors. I use wheel covers to stroll the stroller through the house in order to store it. My cat is almost ten pounds and the stroller holds her weight nicely and she has plenty of room.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Lace

customer_reviews.title: Front wheel does not swivel, or at lease I can't make it do so
customer_reviews.text: I gave this item 4 stars because I can't figure out the front tire. It does not swivel making it hard to push and maneuver. I wish there was a way to communicate with the seller to get some recommendations. This is a very well made stroller. I am so impressed with it on all but that one feature and I'm sure there is a correction I can make but I can't find anyone to speak to about it. If anyone else has had this problem, please communicate the fix, if any. Otherwise, I do not think you can go wrong with this stroller.
customer_reviews.author: CD N

customer_reviews.title: I love this stroller
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller!! Holds both of my dogs. One is 15 pounds. The other is 17 pounds. High quality. I replaced the pad with a thick, comfy dog bed pillow. My dogs love it. The only thing to be aware of is that it is still large even when collapsed. Takes up a lot of space in the back of my SUV...but I wouldn't do without it. I am able to take my dogs with us on vacation. People don't give me grief when I bring them into stores while they are enclosed in the stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Lake girl

customer_reviews.title: Don't think twice
customer_reviews.text: I speed-walk, jog at least five miles a day. My little Lula is only able to do about 2 1/2 -3 mules before she gets tired. I purchased this stroller in hopes she would like it so I can finish my workout. It surpassed my expectations. I did all my homework and research and decided on this one. It is so well-made. Nothing cheap looking or feeling about it. It's very sturdy and I love the air tires. Its super super easy to assemble. I know we're going to have this stroller for a long time. Best of all, my baby loves it!
customer_reviews.author: scribbs

customer_reviews.title: You won’t find a better pet stroller!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is incredibly sturdy & the air tires make a HUGE difference in the smoothness of the ride for the little pups! They make it very easy to collapse and store away and I never knew how important it would be to have cup holders and compartments up by your hands! I was a little shocked that the divider didn’t come with the stroller for the price! Having to pay 40.00 more for that seems odd since it came with a weather cover, an air pump, and a cushion bed.
customer_reviews.author: janna

customer_reviews.title: I have two 14 year old mini Dachshunds who love this ride
customer_reviews.text: I have two 14 year old mini Dachshunds who love this ride! I have used it everyday since it arrived. They are no longer able to handle a long walk but I have hated leaving them at home. This stroller has been the perfect solution. They ride a while, then they walk a while. I've used it on sidewalks, as well as mulch and pea gravel paths and it is very adaptable to them all. They only thing I would warn against is the item description that it would accommodate a 70 lb dog...not so sure about that!!
customer_reviews.author: Dancing Fish

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE it!!! It steers so smoothly. It is very nicely built. The dogs are not getting jostled around while we are walking no matter how bumpy the terrain. It goes nicely over grass as well as sidewalks. I love that the dogs can see out and watch where we are going. We have thoroughly enjoyed it from the very first day it arrived. I was wary about spending so much money on a dog stroller but it is definitely worth it!!! I do not regret it at all!!! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Studinski

customer_reviews.title: One very bad feature but otherwise good.
customer_reviews.text: I’d give this 5 stars except the hood latch iS IMPOSSIBLE to unhook. Two men and a woman couldn’t unhook it. Our dog was inside and getting upset. Finally got it open. Will have to come up with an alternate was to hook it. I shouldn’t have to do this for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Pet Gear No-Zip NV Pet Stroller for Cats/Dogs, Zipperless Entry, Easy One-Hand Fold, Air Tires, Plush Pad + Weather Cover Included, Optional Divider
product_meta.description: Color:Rose| Style:No-Zip NV Pet Stroller OnlyWith the NV No-Zip Pet Stroller, no zippers means no hassle when trying to open and close the stroller. Our new NO-ZIP technology means that you can easily gain access to your pet without fumbling with difficult zippers. The NV Pet Stroller also features an elevated paw rest. Your pet can easily look out of the stroller by using the front bar for support. This stroller navigates over rough terrain with ease, whether jogging or strolling, thanks to the front locking wheel. Speaking of strolling, the new panoramic view window allows your pet to remain safe inside of the stroller without missing any sights along the way. This stroller also features a plush bolster pad, air tires for a smoother ride and new stylish colors and embroidery, what more could a pet want? Suitable for pets up to 70-Pounds. Product Dimensions: 30 inch L x13 inch W x22 inch H Compartment Dimensions: 28 inch L x 12.5 inch W x 22.5 inch H Product Weight: 32 Pounds Height to Handle: 41.5 inch
feature_bullets: Easy-locking No-Zip entry; no struggling with zippers!
Bolster Pad and Weather cover included!
Panoramic view window with 3 position canopy
12 inch Air Ride tires, imensions: 30 inch L x13 inch W x22 inch H, Compartment Dimensions: 28 inch L x 12.5 inch W x 22.5 inch H, Weight: 32 Pounds ,Height to Handle: 41.5 inch
Please scroll below and read "From the Manufacturer" for exciting features.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
